channel.title: Pvp World - 525 - Safe Spots and PVP Area's
channel.description:
I was just wondering how to make a 525 server, like a PVP world in Runescape. (Everywhere is a PVP world but banks)
EX: Jc-Scape - [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww95/Armadylstears/24-05-20097-54-56PM.png[/img]
(I know its suppose to be property, and then theres "Safe" zone really sorry for grammer) Sorry Just wondering if anyone could help, Thanks?
=(
